long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KDiff++ Tool was designed to help compare two texts for differences.
Just paste the two texts and hit the Find Difference button. The two texts are shown with differences highlighted Green and Red color. Green indicates newly added text where as Red indicates removed text.
